output.title: response for create hackathon
output.description: will return information of the newly created hackathon

name.description: unique name of the hackathon which is required in many restful requests(via http header)

status.description: the status of the hackathon. 0=init, 1=online, 2=offline. User can only view and join online hackathons which admin can view all status of hackathons

display_name.description: display name of the hackathon which will showed on the  web pages

input.title: request to create a new hackathon
input.description: args to create new hackathon. Args that not listed here are NOT acceptable.

name.description: name of hackathon. Required and must be unique

display_name.description: the display name of hackathon which will be displayed in client website
